CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In the case of PQCDTB , unlike the PQA2T ( poly[quinacridone-bithiophene] ) reported by Takimiya et al.

Let's think step by step.
1. PQCDTB: This is a material name. It stands for poly[quinacridone-bithiophene]. The name consists of an acronym (PQ) followed by the material name (quinacridone-bithiophene).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In the case of PQCDTB , unlike the PQA2T ( poly[quinacridone-bithiophene] ) reported by Takimiya et al.

Let's think step by step.

1. PQCDTB: This is a specific name of a compound or material. It can be considered as a "Compound" or "Material Property Name" entity.
2. PQA2T: This is also a specific name of a compound or material. It can be considered as a "Compound" or "Material Property Name" entity.
3. poly[quinacridone-bithiophene]: This is a specific type of polymer. It can be considered as a "Polymer Property Name" entity.
4. Takimiya et al.: This is a group of people or researchers. It is not a property name, but for the sake of completeness, it can be considered as a "Person Group" entity.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PQCDTB: This is a specific material name. It can be considered as a "Material Property Name" entity.
2. poly[quinacridone-bithiophene]: This is a specific type of material. It can be considered as a "Material Property Name" entity.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In the case of PQCDTB , unlike the PQA2T ( poly[quinacridone-bithiophene] ) reported by Takimiya et al.

Let's think step by step.

1. PQCDTB: This is a specific type of polymer identified by the acronym PQCDTB.
2. PQA2T: This is another specific type of polymer identified by the acronym PQA2T.
3. poly[quinacridone-bithiophene]: This is a type of polymer that includes quinacridone and bithiophene units in its structure.
4. Takimiya et al.: This refers to the researchers or authors who reported on the properties of PQA2T.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PQCDTB: This is a specific type of polymer. (Relevant if the discussion is about the material properties of PQCDTB)
2. PQA2T: This is another specific type of polymer. (Relevant if the discussion is about the material properties of PQA2T)
3. quinacridone-bithiophene: This is a type of polymer structure that includes quinacridone and bithiophene units. (Relevant if the discussion is about the material properties related to the structure of PQA2T and PQCDTB)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| PQCDTB (polymer) |
| PQA2T (polymer) |
| poly[quinacridone-bithiophene] (polymer structure) |
